price: Naho ba bandi batizera kuzahura natwe, baravuze bati “Kuki tutohererezwa Abamalayika (bo kutubwira ko uri Intumwa y’ukuri) cyangwa ngo tubone Nyagasani wacu?” Rwose bishyize hejuru bikabije baranarengera!
arabic: ۞ وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَرۡجُونَ لِقَآءَنَا لَوۡلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيۡنَا ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ أَوۡ نَرَىٰ رَبَّنَاۗ لَقَدِ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ فِيٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ وَعَتَوۡ عُتُوّٗا كَبِيرٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: waqāla alladhīna lā yarjūna liqāanā lawlā unzila ʿalaynā al-malāikatu aw narā rabbanā laqadi is'takbarū fī anfusihim waʿataw ʿutuwwan kabīran
